mutants.code:
def max_books_read(N, M, K, A, B):
    A = deque(A)
    B = deque(B)
    tmp = sum(A)
    cnt = len(A)
    res = 1
    while True:
        if tmp <= K:
            res = max(res, cnt)
            if len(B) <= 0:
                break
            b = B.popleft()
            tmp += b
            cnt += 1
        else:
            if len(A) <= 0:
                break
            a = A.pop()
            tmp -= a
            cnt -= 1
    return res
